head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SHORT, DOROTHY C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SHORT, DOROTHY C.

block.p: SHORT-Dorothy C. On June 27, 2000. Sister of the late Lillian Lamour, Florence Mooney, Rita and Willianm Short. Beloved aunt of Roger W. Lamour, Henry M. Lamour and Marilyn Walsh. Friends may call of Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave at 81 Street, Thursday June 29, 2-5 and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian burial will be at St. Stephen of Hungary Church, 414 East 82nd Street, on Friday June 30 at 10AM. Interment at Gate of Heaven Cemetery.

Mass of Christian burial will be at St. Stephen of Hungary Church, 414 East 82nd Street, on Friday June 30 at 10AM. Interment at Gate of Heaven Cemetery.
